content: Interesting. I saw a similar post on the forum for another email client with the same message, that email clients would not be allowed. Only webmail. Their website still indicates support - https://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/email-settings but possibly not current.

content: Dobrý den, tak nakonec jsem si poradil. Pomohlo vymazání souborů *.msf viz druhý bod tohoto odkazu: https://happydoghosting.net/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/4992/How-to-fix-issues-with-Mozilla-Thunderbird-and-make-it-FAST.html
creator: elbeduard

content:
I got some further. Now I believe that the problem is in SOGo. The custom property in the VCARD should rather be: X-CUSTOM1;VALUE=TEXT:My custom value

That is the format Thunderbird uses. That should hopefully be in line with the CardDAV spec (https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc6352#page-17 6.3.2.2. Non-Standard vCard Properties and Parameters).

Jan
creator: janskarvall

content: Bu özellikleri kullanmak için takvim sunucunuzun (CalDAV) olması lazım. E-posta hizmeti aldığınız firma CalDAV desteği sunuyor olabilir. Yapmanız gereken ayarları onlardan öğrenebilirsiniz.
creator: maxcoder

content: Het lijkt er op dat het hoofdwachtwoord niet correct is. Een mogelijk oplossing is door het hoofdwachtwoord te verwijderen als uitgelegd op https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/thunderbird-wachtwoorden-beschermen-hoofdwachtwoord. LET OP: dit verwijdert ook de bestaande wachtwoorden.
creator: Fjoerfoks

content: I cannot advise on the proper CSS to resolve your issue, but I can advise you that this is not a bug. I say that because use of userChrome.css is not officially supported.
creator: davidsk

content: Thank you for your reply. I do realize that user styling via userChrome is not officialy supported. However, I sucessfully tested the CSS style in Firefox by copying the relevant elements form TB inspector. What is more, my experience with Thunderbird is that userChrome works great in Supernova. What I am trying to understand is the behaviour of some aspects of the style not being applied straight away.
